
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is a matrix which is symmetric about its center.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether a value is a centrosymmetric matrix.

    Examples
    --------
    > var M = {};
    > M.data = [ 2, 1, 1, 2 ];
    > M.ndims = 2;
    > M.shape = [ 2, 2 ];
    > M.strides = [ 2, 1 ];
    > M.offset = 0;
    > M.order = 'row-major';
    > M.dtype = 'generic';
    > M.length = 4;
    > M.flags = {};
    > M.get = function get( i, j ) { return M.data[ (2*i)+j ]; };
    > M.set = function set( i, j ) {};
    > var bool = {{alias}}( M )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( [ 1, 2, 3, 4 ] )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( 3.14 )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( {} )
    false

    See Also
    --------
